GK16vamkalvu:1424: kriyayaiva śuddhayā svasyātmanastadarthaḥ cānvayasya saṃbandhasya khyāpanaṃ saṃlulitahetudṛṣṭāntavibhāgadarśanānnidarśanam / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1434: uktasiddhyai uktasyārthasya siddhyartha vastuno vākyārthāntarasyaiva nyasanamarthāntaranyāsaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1438: yatra heturvyāptigūḍhatvāt kathañcit pratīyate tatra yathā syāt /
GK16vamkalvu:1442: srajaṃ na kācidvijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni // //21//
GK16vamkalvu:1447: upameyasya guṇātirekatvaṃ guṇādhikyaṃ yad arthādupamānāt sa vyatirekaḥ / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1457: ekasya guṇasya hāneḥ kalpanāyāṃ śeṣairguṇaissāmyaṃ yattasya dārḍhyaṃ viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1474: tasya sambhāvyasya kartuṃ śakyasyākaraṇānnindāviśiṣṭasāmyasampādanena stotrārthā vyājastutiḥ / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1476: evaṃvidhaṃ karma tatāna rāmastvayā kṛtaṃ tanna mudhaiva garvaḥ // //24//
GK16vamkalvu:1485: viśiṣṭena nyūnasya sāmyarthamekakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ yogastulyayogitā / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1491: saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau ca yadi cet kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1492: kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare
GK16vamkalvu:1502: vastudvasya kriyayostulyakālayorekena padenābhidhānaṃ sahārthaśabdasāmarthyāt sahoktiḥ / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1503: astaṃ bhāsvān prayātaḥ saha ripubhirayaṃ saṃhriyantāṃ balāni /
GK16vamkalvu:1504: atrārthayornyūnatvaviśiṣṭatve na sta iti neyaṃ tulyayogiteti // //28//
GK16vamkalvu:1508: yasya vastunaḥ sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate tasya vastunaḥ sampattiḥ samāhitam / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1513: atra purūravaso latāyāmurvaśyāḥ sādṛśyaṃ gṛhṇataḥ saiva latorvaśī saṃpanneti //29//

GK16vamkalvu:1522: niravadhi ca nirāśrayaṃ ca yasya sthitamanivartitakautukaprapañcam /
GK16vamkalvu:1523: prathama iva bhavān sa kūrmamūrtirjayati caturdaśalokavallikandaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1538: samprati kāvyasamayaṃ śabdaśuddhiṃ ca darśayituṃ prāyogikākhyamadhikaraṇamārabhyate /
GK16vamkalvu:1540: naikaṃ padaṃ dviḥ prayojyaṃ prāyeṇa // VKal_5,1.1 //

GK16vamkalvu:1596: vṛtticchannasya vṛttau samāse channasya guṇībhūtasya / yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1599: sambandhena sanbandhaḥ sambandhasambandhastasmin ṣaṣṭhī prayojyā kvacit ,
GK16vamkalvu:1602: kamalena saṃbaddhā kamalinī tasyā kandaḥ iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1605: atīva kavibhiḥ prayuktaṃ deśabhāṣāpadaṃ prayojyam / yathā ----

GK16vamkalvu:1614: mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madakalaḥ paraśurvā /
